webscript.description:
This component is used to load JS and CSS files which specified in the configuration
Configuration part should be like: <config evaluator="string-compare" condition="TaskEditJsCssMessages"> <dependencies> <js src="/citeck/components/workflow/task-edit-header.js" /> <css src="/citeck/components/workflow/task-edit-header.css" /> <messages component="org/alfresco/components/workflow/task-edit-header.get" /> <messages resource="alfresco.site-messages.idocs.datatable-property" /> </dependencies> </config>
